member.name: T:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice
member.summary:
Humidity chamber device
The HumidityChamber device is an \ref AccessibleDevices "accessible device" representing exactly one sias humidity chamber module on a sias instrument.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_HumidityChamber
The interface includes - configuration properties for - Carrier lock - Carrier Sensor - Device state LED - Default humidity - layout properties for the humidity chamber slot - methods for - setting humidity chamber thresholds - activating/deactivating humidity control - humidity chamber ventilation .
%SHumidityChamberDevice class diagram
\image html "SHumidityChamberDevice.png"

member.summary: This method handles the module errors of SHumidityChamber devices
member.details: Possible Module types: - 0x0040 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST "MT_SHAKER") . Handled errors: - none .
member.param: true if force error handling, false if not

member.summary: Convert real humidity [%] to module humidity value [%]

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.HumidityFromModule(System.Int16)
member.summary: Convert module humidity [%] to real humidity value [%]

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.SetThresholds(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary:
Set humidity thresholds
This method is used to set the humidity thresholds. - ThresholdHumidityGenerator As long as the humidity in the chamber is below this value the Humidity generator gets activated. On higher humidties it gets turned off. - ThresholdHumidityFan As long as the humidity in the chamber is below this value the Humidity fan gets activated. On higher humidties the fan gets turned off. . \b Important: It is not valid to have ThresholdHumidityFan lower than ThresholdHumidityGenerator. Under this condition the Hardware will deactivate the humidity generator to avoid defects.
member.remarks: The device gets locked/unlocked in this method. Timeout: MessageLockTimeout

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.ActivateHumidityControl(System.Double)
member.summary:
Activate humidity control
This method activates Humidity control by setting humidity generator threshold and fan threshold to the defined target humidity.
member.remarks: The device gets locked/unlocked in this method. Timeout: MessageLockTimeout

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.DeactivateHumidityControl
member.summary:
Deactivate humidity control
This method deactivates humidity control. Humidity generator and fan will remain off.
member.remarks: The device gets locked/unlocked in this method. Timeout: MessageLockTimeout

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.VentilateChamber
member.summary:
Ventilate humidity chamber
This method deactivates the humidity generator but activates the fan. This can be used to ventilate the humidity chamber.
member.remarks: The device gets locked/unlocked in this method. Timeout: MessageLockTimeout

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.GetMeanRealHumidity
member.summary:
Get current temperature from heated position device.
If the device has more than one channel, this temperature depends on the hardware modules. It can be the mean of the channels or also the temperature of the first channel.

member.name: F:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.ActualLayoutDevice
member.summary: Actual layout device. E.g. for sending the display state to layout

member.name: F:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.RequestedAccessMode
member.summary: requested access mode

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.AttachLayoutData(Sias.Core.Interfaces.ILayoutDevice)
member.summary:
Attach layout data.
This method tries to attach the layout data found at the given layout device to the device. If this will succeed it returns true. If it fails it returns false. In this case the calling method should retry until it finds a fitting layout device.
member.param: The layout device to attach or null to unattach an attached layout device.
member.returns: true if attachable, false if not

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.GetAccessMode(System.Object)
member.summary:
Get Access mode.
This Method is used to request the actual access mode.
member.returns: Access mode for the given caller object

member.name: M:Sias.HumidityChamber.SHumidityChamberDevice.SetAccessMode(System.Object,Sias.Core.Interfaces.SAccessMode,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Set access mode.
This method prepares the scale module to allow the requested access.
member.remarks: Remarks: - If the timeout is longer than the remaining scale time the function will not wait for the finished timeout. It will return inaccessible immediately
